snippet.title: Blade Symphony Teaser Trailer: "Sakura Danger"
snippet.description:
Blade Symphony is a tactical sword-fighting game featuring a highly detailed and in-depth sword fighting system. Face down other players in skill-based tactical swordplay, in 2vs2 team duels, or participate in sandbox FFA game modes.

This trailer was cut entirely from in-game footage.

Out May 7th on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/225600/
